replies.body:
Welcome to Avicus! You'll enjoy your stay here, especially since you've found the forums! ;D



Alright, staff introduction stuff...
Don't forget to read the rules: http://www.avicus.net/rules
Voting for Avicus promotes the server - you get free XP for doing so! http://www.avicus.net/vote
If you need help, don't forget to consult a staff member or ask a friendly member of the community! We're not afraid to help ^-^
